channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee LLC -- McAfee DXL for Mac shipped with MA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee LLC -- McAfee DXL for Mac shipped with MA

item.title: CVE-2020-7314|2024-09-17T00:16:24.860Z -- mcafee%20llc -- mcafee%20dxl%20for%20mac%20shipped%20with%20ma
item.description: Privilege Escalation Vulnerability in the installer in McAfee Data Exchange Layer (DXL) Client for Mac shipped with McAfee Agent (MA) for Mac prior to MA 5.6.6 allows local users to run commands as root via incorrectly applied permissions on temporary files.
